about_the_game:
Have you ever struggled with breaking up with someone because you didn’t know how they’d react? Maybe you’ve never broken up with someone before and aren’t sure how exactly to end it. Maybe you’ve been dating someone for years and would rather be friends. “It’s Not Me, It's You...” features cutting edge AI breakup simulator to help prepare you when you decide to ultimately end whatever relationship you’re in. By specifying your partner and relationship information, you can prepare for how realistic their responses may be so when you decide to have the actual conversation, you’ll be ready.

KEY FEATURES:

- Cutting edge AI system for real-life conversations.
- Talk with an emotional and interactive AI character that can learn and adapt to the conversation.
- Customize the looks, attitudes and personality of the AI to match your partner.
- Specify specific events that may have prompted the breakup.
- Choose from a variety of realistic digital humans to customize the breakup experience even further.

content_descriptors.notes: Mature content depends on the type of conversation you have with the AI. If you start to use profanity or talk about about mature content, the AI will typically reciprocate. Especially if you make the AI upset.

name: It's not me, it's you...

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Processor: Intel i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RTX 2060
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Processor: Ryzen 5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RTX 2060

short_description: “It’s Not Me, It’s You…” features a breakup simulator using a cutting-edge AI system to prepare you for breaking up with your partner. Customize the looks, attitudes and personality of the AI to match your partner to make the experience feel as real as possible.
